article_title: What do we know about Gaza's Indonesian Hospital?
sentence: The  Hamas-run  health  ministry  said  at  least  12  people  were  killed  in  an  air  strike  there  on  Monday  -  Israel  said  its  forces  were  fired  at  "from  within"  the  hospital,  and  its  troops  targeted  the  source  of  the  fire.
